title: Restarted
overview: Thai series Reâ€¢start(ed), a story about a big change during the college life of "U" who has a new friend like "Chin". They both built a friendship born of closeness. But no one knew that friendship formed a certain feeling. Which leads to a point where they can't get out of each other's orbits because they're going to cycle back to starting all over again. But a fresh start might be the best choice for "Zee Mai" who was called a nerd boy by all his friends because of his life focusing on books and studies. One day, he had to change because of his own hot junior "Zo" who made his heart flutter. and pain at the same time That forced him to shake off his nerdy image to change himself. But for those who have never had a boyfriend like "Jed", they have to fall in love with "Anwa" unconsciously. So love happens all at the same time without realizing it.''
